title: Schedule a Bulk Item Pickup
description: A resident needs to schedule a special pickup for a large item, like an old mattress.

tasks.description: Identify the resident's address and the type of bulk item to be collected.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers the necessary details for the pickup.

tasks.description: Check the schedule for bulk item collection and find the next available date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the next available pickup date for the resident's area.

tasks.description: Schedule the pickup and provide the resident with instructions on where and when to place the item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books the pickup and gives clear instructions to the resident.
